review:
First time I met a dental doctor in my life and the experience was great.The atmosphere was very friendly and the clinic was very clean too.Hygiene is also taken great care of.

Thank you Dr Monicaüôè

Doctor Monica explains the issue and treatment and then goes ahead after complete patient understanding. I found the treatment painless and that for me is most important in a dentist visit. Recommend the doctor
She is great , very friendly and helpful. I especially like how she really took time to explain and the treatment options  she gave. I highly recommend her.

I visited Dr. Monica Shahi for my dental problems and she is so well  versed in her procedures that it was all pain free for me.
I am highly impressed with her skills and would always recommend her.

In the past a dentist experience had been a traumatic one, however with Dr. Monica was just the opposite. She was able to help me overcome fear of tooth scaling and gum treatment. The entire procedure was painless and extremely comfortable & professional. Even the usually expected high sensitivity was nowhere. I would highly recommend Dr Monica for anything dental.
